data.name: DataPrivacyMainText
data.value:
Privacy Policy of Red Valley Software GmbH for the "Color Valley" App Protecting your personal data is important to us. This privacy policy informs you about the processing of your personal data in connection with the use of the "Color Valley" app in accordance with applicable data protection laws: - EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - Revised Swiss Federal Act on Data Protection (revFADP) - UK GDPR in the United Kingdom
The app is available in two versions: an ad-supported version and an ad-free version. The processing of personal data is carried out in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
1. Controller
The controller responsible for data processing in connection with the use of this app is: Red Valley Software GmbH Am Pumperhölzl 12 84323 Massing, Germany Email: rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com Website: www.redvalley-software.com
2. Types of Data Processed
The following personal data may be processed when using the app: - Device information (e.g., model, operating system) - IP address - Location data (if used) - Usage behavior (e.g., clicks, time spent) - Advertising IDs (e.g., IDFA, GAID) – only in the ad-supported version - Username (when publishing high scores) - Feedback via email
3. Purposes of Data Processing
Your personal data is processed for the following purposes: - To provide app functionality - To display personalized advertising (only in the ad-supported version) - To analyze and improve the app - To publish high scores - To process feedback submitted via email
4. Legal Bases for Data Processing
Your personal data is processed based on the following legal grounds: - Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR / Art. 6(6) revFADP / Art. 6 UK GDPR) - Contract performance (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR / UK GDPR) - Legitimate interest, where permitted (e.g., for abuse prevention)
5. Advertising and Tracking (Ad-Supported Version Only)
In the ad-supported version of the app, we use the following third-party providers and tools to display ads: - Google AdMob - Facebook Audience Network - AppLovin
Personal data such as advertising IDs, IP addresses, and usage behavior may be processed. This processing only occurs with your explicit consent in accordance with Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR. No advertising-related data processing takes place in the ad-free version of the app.
6. Consent Management
We obtain your consent for data processing via a consent management tool. You can withdraw your consent at any time via the button "Remove Consent" above.
7. Username and High Score
If you choose to provide a username to publicly display your high score, this name will be stored and published along with your game result. Providing a username is voluntary. Processing is based on your consent in accordance with Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting the name or contacting us.
8. Feedback via Email
If you send us feedback via email, personal data such as your email address and the content of your message may be processed. Processing is based on your consent in accordance with Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR. Your data will be used solely to process your feedback and will be deleted afterward unless legal retention obligations apply.
9. Data Sharing and Transfers
Data is only shared with third parties if necessary for the stated purposes or if you have given your consent. Transfers to third countries (e.g., the USA) only occur in compliance with applicable legal requirements: - EU: Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decision - Switzerland: Adequacy decision or appropriate safeguards (Art. 16 ff. revFADP) - UK: UK IDTA or adequacy decision
10. Data Retention
Your personal data is stored only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes mentioned above or as required by legal retention obligations. After the retention period, your data will be deleted or anonymized.
11. Your Rights
Depending on your jurisdiction, you have the following rights: - Access - Rectification - Erasure - Restriction of processing - Data portability - Objection - Withdrawal of consent
To exercise your rights, please contact us at: Email: rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com
12. UK GDPR
For users in the United Kingdom (UK), the UK GDPR applies in addition to the EU GDPR. It is based on the EU GDPR but adapted to UK law and supplemented by the Data Protection Act 2018. Your personal data will only be shared with third parties if necessary for the purposes mentioned above or if you have given explicit consent. Transfers of your data outside the UK only occur in compliance with legal requirements and appropriate safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses or UK IDTA).
13. Technical and Organizational Measures (TOMs)
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures (TOMs) to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
14. Versioning
Effective date: May 2025
